text_block_list.name: Bitter Glasse
text_block_list.text: But well… you ran well. I can accept defeat!

text_block_list.name: Bitter Glasse
text_block_list.text: … A'ight! I'm going home to work out! Starting with 100 tire pulls!

text_block_list.name: Little Cocon
text_block_list.text: … It's true, I wasn't strong enough today.

text_block_list.name: Little Cocon
text_block_list.text: But I won't lose next time. Individually, or in the Aoharu Hai.

text_block_list.name: Little Cocon
text_block_list.text: I'll see you then. Congratulations on your victory.
